CustomField.formula: IF(AND(OR(ShippingCountry ='Sweden', ShippingCountry ='Netherlands', ShippingCountry ='Belgium', ShippingCountry ='Luxembourg'), OR(ShippingStreet = null,ShippingCity = null,ShippingCountry = null,ShippingPostalCode = null)),1,0)
CustomField.label: Validate ActivateShippingAddressRequired
